Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class DatacenterBroker

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.DatacenterBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PowerDatacenterBroker
public class DatacenterBroker
extends SimEntity
DatacentreBroker represents a broker acting on behalf of a user. It hides VM management, as vm creation, sumbission of cloudlets to this VMs and destruction of VMs.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

      public void shutdownEntity()
